message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay $100 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $115.  I believe this product will really benefit you and this is a fair price.
I appreciate your stance, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose $110 as the price for the product.
